response_html:
Hi {{ doc.first_name or 'there' }},

Thank you for subscribing to the ilLumenate Lighting newsletter!

We're excited to have you join our community. You'll be the first to know about:

  • New product launches
  • Design inspiration and project spotlights
  • Exclusive offers and updates

In the meantime, feel free to explore our website and discover how ilLumenate can transform your lighting projects.

Best regards,
The ilLumenate Lighting Team
